ALD.ellipsometer.ellipsometer_interface module¶

class ALD.ellipsometer.ellipsometer_interface.Ellipsometer_Interface(host='192.168.0.1', port=4444, debug=False)¶

Bases: object

Interface level ScopeFoundry module for Woolam Ellipsometer control. Creates object used to connect to Ellipsometer via RJ45 connection over TCP/IP protocol.
